content.heroIntro: Welcome to BAHIA CENTER, INTERCOSTA VILLAS' stunning new residential development in the heart of Centro, Torrevieja. This premier project offers a perfect blend of contemporary design, exceptional amenities, and strategic location in one of Spain's most vibrant coastal communities. With 5 exclusive units available—including penthouses and apartments ranging from 1 to 3 bedrooms—BAHIA CENTER represents the pinnacle of modern living in Torrevieja. Spanning from 52 to 137 square meters, these thoughtfully designed homes cater to discerning buyers seeking quality, style, and investment potential. Scheduled for delivery on 01-09-2027, BAHIA CENTER by INTERCOSTA VILLAS combines premium construction standards with affordable pricing that's 45% less than Costa Blanca North properties. Whether you're seeking a vacation retreat, investment property, or permanent residence in Spain's largest expat community, BAHIA CENTER offers an unparalleled opportunity to own property in one of Torrevieja's most desirable neighborhoods.

locationSection.intro: Centro, Torrevieja, is the vibrant heart of this thriving Mediterranean coastal town and represents an exceptional choice for property investment and lifestyle. Located in the province of Alicante, Centro offers the perfect balance of cosmopolitan amenities, authentic Spanish culture, and beachfront living. This prestigious neighborhood attracts a diverse international community—Torrevieja boasts Spain's largest expat population with English spoken everywhere, making integration seamless for foreign buyers. Centro's strategic position provides immediate access to world-class healthcare including Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja (public, 24-hour service) and private options like Quirónsalud, ensuring peace of mind for families. The stunning Playa del Cura, a Blue Flag beach, is minutes away, offering pristine Mediterranean waters and golden sands. Shopping enthusiasts enjoy proximity to multiple Mercadona locations, Carrefour, and international supermarkets including Iceland for British products. The neighborhood's dynamic restaurant scene, cultural attractions, and easy access to championship golf courses make Centro an ideal base for both relaxation and recreation. Torrevieja's property market continues to appreciate at +8% year-on-year, making Centro an increasingly attractive investment destination.
